Posts.Content: Thanks - feel relieved that you and others know the experience. Just wondering if its ok to use dove soap in the armpits?

Posts.Content: Thanks Marty and all who replied - much appreciated - hope everyone recovers well!
Posts.Title: pain and numbness after op

Posts.Content: Hi I'm not sure if I'm writing in the right place or not! I had breast cancer surgery two days ago and all the lymph nodes also taken out - is it usual to feel a lot of pain and weird numbness as well? thanks
Posts.Title: pain and numbness after op

Posts.Content: Thanks for the replies - much appreciated - haven't a clue what it's all about yet - will probs be posting more though don't quite know my way around yet- sure Â I will find out with practice - thanks again!
Posts.Title: pain and numbness after op

Posts.Content: Hi - totally natural to be scared - had tumour out last Monday and total node clearance -felt very upset after op - no real feedback. One of the surgeons couldn't understand why I was upset. I have been utterly gobsmacked over the lack of emotional care. I honestly can't get over how cut off from normal human feelings these professionals are - I truly find THAT scary and the least possible time I'm in a hospital the better. I'd rather be at home and die there peacefully if needs be.
